pgrid.network
Class Connection

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.network.Connection

public class Connection
extends Object

This class represents a connection.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
@author Roman Schmidt

Field Summary
static short STATUS_ACCEPTING
          The connection is accepting.
static short STATUS_CONNECTED
          The connection is active.
static short STATUS_CONNECTING
          A connection is established.
static short STATUS_ERROR
          The connection has caused an error.
static short STATUS_NOT_CONNECTED
          The connection is not used.
